tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR (50),
    artist_name VARCHAR (50),
    price DECIMAL (10, 2),
    year_created INT,
    material VARCHAR (50),
    inventory_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    sculpture_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    date_of_creation DATE,
    material VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id UUID,
    transaction_date DATE,
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    price_paid DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES sculptures(sculpture_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions ( 
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    sculpture_id INT REFERENCES sculptures(sculpture_id), 
    buyer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE Sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name TEXT,
    artist_name TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    inventory_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    sculpture_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Artists (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name TEXT,
    nationality TEXT,
    birth_year INT,
    style TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Galleries (
    gallery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gallery_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    contact_number TEXT,
    website TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Sculpture (
    sculpture_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    material VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Transaction (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id UUID,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES Sculpture(sculpture_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArtFair (
    fair_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    fair_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
